Package gate.learning

Class Summary
ActiveLearningSetting Store the settings for active learning, by reading the settings from configuration file.
ArgOfRelation Store the identification information and the related features for the annotation corresponding to one argument of a relation
ArraysDataSetDefinition Arrays and variables representing the features from one unit of data set definition, for the purpose of fast computation.
Attribute Desribe and read the ATTRIBUTE, one type of features in the dataset definition.
AttributeRelation Extend the Attribute class a bit in order to accommodate the two arguments of one relation.
ChunkLengthStats Store the length statitics of chunks belonging to one type which will be used by the post-processing procedure.
ConstantParameters Define the constant parameters used accross different classes in the ML api.
DataSetDefinition Stores data described in the DATASET element of configuration file.
DocFeatureVectors Convert the NLP features into a sparse feature vector for each instance of one document.
DocFeatureVectors.LongCompactor A static class for comparing two long numbers.
EvaluationBasedOnDocs Do evaluation by splitting the documents into training and testing datasets.
EvaluationConfiguration Store the spefications of evaluation method and the details.
EvaluationMeasuresComputation Store the results for computing the F-measures for binary classification problem (or one label of multi-class problems).
Label2Id The list of unique labels, containing string labels and their numeric indexes.
LabelsOfFeatureVectorDoc Labels (indexes) of feature vectors in one document.
LabelsOfFV The multi-label of one feature vector (FV) (or one example).
LearnerSettings The name and options of a learner, specified in the configuration file.
LearningAPIMain The main object of the ML Api.
LearningEngineSettings Reading and storing the learning settings from the configuration file.
LightWeightLearningApi Do all the main learning tasks, such as obtaining the feature vectors from GATE annotations, training and application.
LogService Write the learning information into a log file, which name is specified in ConstantParameters.java.
MiLearningInformation  
Ngram Desribing the NGAM features defined in the DATASET element of the configuration file.
NLPFeaturesList NLP feature list.
NLPFeaturesOfDoc  
SparseFeatureVector One feature vector in the sparse format, with length, indexes and values.
UsefulFunctions Some useful functions.
 

Enum Summary
RunMode
